summary: Reaz Hoque has spent spent the majority of his career helping premier, cross-industry organizations use both current and emerging technologies to solve complex business problems, reduce costs, and gain competitive advantage. Mr. Hoque began his career as a software architect at GE Capital where he was part of the development team that implemented the first business-to-government commerce community and marketplace, enabling government agencies to manage their sourcing functionalities. Earlier in his career, Marc Andreesen recruited Mr. Hoque as a technology evangelist for Netscape.Considered a visionary technology thought-leader, he has authored several groundbreaking technology books. He is a key contributor to various industry trade magazines, and a frequent speaker at industry conferences and events.Specialties: Business application design and development management, outsourcing management, technical and non technical product roll outs, creative product branding and marketing and most recently strategic event planning and management.
